1.title: Intro

11.content:
Jerry is a happily married German Shepherd with a loving golden retriever-wife named Emma and a father of triplet daughters (Barbara, Lisa and Maggie). He’s in his mid 40’s and he’s handsome with a skinny body and is wearing glasses. He works for a company in the city he and his family lives in, and he gets paid really well. With a loving family and many friends he couldn’t have been more content with his life.

Although his friends (mostly the ones from his high school- and college-days) keep telling him to ”live a little”. And by ”live a little”, they mean Jerry should party with them and watch some strippers doing sexy dancing. But something, or someone, has other ideas…

After getting on board, he sat down on a empty seat. As soon as the train started moving, the lights suddenly went out and it’s pitch-black inside the cart. Jerry’s starting to get frightened as he couldn’t hear anybody. Thanks to the passing lights in the tunnel, he saw that he’s all alone! Where is everyone?! What is going on?!
Suddenly, there’s bright light outside the windows and the train stopped. The doors opened and by instinct, he walks out.

Before he knew it, he’s suddenly in some type of garden. When he turned, the train was nowhere to be seen.

I thought you were a myth?”, he said, and she giggles before answering, ”That’s what me and the other ancient gods wants you silly mortals to think. These males are ones with happy marriages or other types of relations. Before he could ask, Cloetta says ”your clothes are in another room, you can have them once we’re done”, she crawls onto the bed towards him, ”And I’ll have you know that a few days in here are like a few seconds on earth”.

12.content:
You are Timmy. You are a cat anthro with a relatively scrawny build. You've been shy and socially awkward for most of your life. Despite your what you thought to be generally unattractive appearance and your lack of social skills, you were still popular with women during your high school years. Something about your shyness and defenselessness being "cute" just drew them to you, whether you wanted it or not. You had just gotten a scholarship to a great college, complete with your own dorm room. It was even relatively close to home, only needing a half hour train ride from your house. The only drawback is that you had to share the dorm with a roommate.

You were startled awake by the train coming to a stop. You grab your bookbag and step off the train. As you exit the subway you see the beautiful campus you will be attending. It was a really large place with plenty of buildings. Somone could get lost here. Now, the question is, where do you go first?
12.title: Timmy the college-cat

121.content:
You decide to take this free time to check put your new room. You check the map to find the student aid desk. After a bit of a walk, you find the desk with a human woman about your age behind the counter.

"Hello, welcome to student services, how may I help you?" She asked with a smile.

"Hi, I just enrolled here and I was promised a dorm room. It should be under Timothy." The human types away at her keyboard.

"Let's see here. Timothy the Cat. Ah, here we are. You have a shared room at room 301, here's your key." She hands you a key with the number of the room on the key ring.

"Thanks. Say, if it's not too mich to ask, do you have any info on my roommate? What he is, what's he like, that sort of thing?"

"Well, it doesn't say who your roommate is, but I'm sure she will like you just fine cute stuff."

"Wait... she?" You question.

"You didn't know? The boys' dorms were filled to capacity when you enroll. They decided that rather than let a promising student like you go because of that, they gave you a room in the girls' dorm building."

"Thank you for your help ma'am." She blows you a kiss goodbye as you set off to find your room.

*****

After a bit of searching, you find your room, 301. You open the door to find your new roommate. A female...

152.content:
"Alright Tom, repeat the rules to me one last time." Vanessa ordered you. She had just turned eighteen and wanted to celebrate her graduation from high school with a big sleepover with some of her friends. The kicker was that, despite her being human, all of her friends were anthropomorphic animals, and sexy ones at that.

"No music louder than yours, I'm not allowed within ten feet of your bedroom door, if you girls are anywhere other than your room, I have to stay in my room no matter what until you go back in your room, don't answer any knock on my bedroom door until your friends leave." You parrot back the orders she's drilled into your head for the past hour. You were a seventeen year old human boy, only slightly younger than her. As such, the thought of a half dozen or so half naked girls in the same house as you drves your hormones wild.

"That's right. Now, grab whatever you need to last the night and lock yourself in your room." She shoos you off to your room while she waits in the living room for her friends. Problem was, you weren't going to follow her rules. You needed to see this and you were going to.

Question is... how?
152.title: Furry Sleepover

153.title: It's Good to be the King

1533.content:
In the not too distant future Frank was a programmer and an inventor whose greatest work was a A.I. of incredible sophistication it was capable of thinking and learning faster than any person, capable of taking over any computer system and solving any problem it faced and it was completely and utterly loyal to Frank responding flawlessly to his every command.
In a few short weeks he was secretly in control of all the world's computer systems and it was not long after that that the secret was out. He had accomplished what countless people throughout history had failed to do, he had conquered the world and without a single life lost.
While no one who proclaims himself ruler of the world can really be said to be selfless Frank's bloodless conquest had many beneficial effects for the world. His A.I. and the, machines it built and controlled revolutionize the world. Automated farms produced food enough to end world hunger when properly distributed. The A.I. could research vaccines as fast as diseases could mutate and it's processing power was an invaluable gift to scientific research. New technologies eased the burden of labour across the world with more and more people free to live lives of leisure. Frank and his invention had created the world where day by day the wants of the past were disappearing.
And so Frank felt no guilt living like the king he was indulging all his hedonistic desires even as his invention transformed the world into a paradise.
---
Frank woke up one bright sunny morning laying back in his massive smiling to himself as he considered how he would spend the day before he was greeted by the sight of...
1533.title: Futuristic

154.content:
Nobody knew what caused it, but one day, some kind of virus had spread across the world. This wasn't your everyday, garden variety flu or smallpox, this was something else entirely. When it hit, almost every woman was transformed into some kind of anthropomorphic animal, with only a handful of women staying pure human.

Men had it much worse. While the women that weren't immune at least got to live, any male that was unfortunate enough to succumb to the disease died within hours. There were even fewer immune men then there were immune women. Between the two, the overall population of pure humans was only 0.001% of what ot used to be, with the rest being either anthro or dead. Anthros took control of the world, forming new governments, each treating humans differently. Some turn humans into slaves, while others have protective services for humans and reproductive services for males.

You are Rick, one of the few humans left. You survived the disease, and now face a new world. The question is, what's your current situation?
154.title: A New World
